name: Analyze and Summarize Article
description: Takes an article from user input, analyzes its sentiment, and provides a concise summary.

tasks.name: User Input Article
tasks.description: Accepts the article text from the user.

tasks.name: Sentiment Analysis
tasks.description: Analyzes the sentiment of the article.
tasks.promptTemplate: Analyze the sentiment of the following article and classify it as POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, or NEUTRAL. Return only the classification. Article: {{articleText}}

tasks.name: Generate Summary
tasks.description: Creates a 3-sentence summary of the article.
tasks.promptTemplate: Summarize the following article in three concise sentences. Article: {{articleText}}

tasks.name: Format Final Report
tasks.description: Combines the summary and sentiment into a final report.

name: Image Content Description
description: Accepts an image, describes its contents, and suggests social media captions.

tasks.name: User Input Image
tasks.description: Accepts an image from the user.

tasks.name: Describe Image Content
tasks.description: Generates a detailed description of the uploaded image.
tasks.promptTemplate: Describe the contents of this image in detail.

tasks.name: Suggest Social Media Captions
tasks.description: Generates 3 social media captions based on the image description.
tasks.promptTemplate: Based on the following description of an image, generate 3 creative and engaging social media captions. Image description: {{imageDescription}}
